name: $user surveys the land, but there are no dinosaurs in sight.
An unexpected rainstorm hit the immediate area. It should blow over in a couple of minutes.
$user stood too close to a gas vent and passed out.
A volcano just errupted! Run for cover!
$user was struck by $randusername's boomarang. Take a few minutes to recover.
Sandstorm approaching! duDudu $user looks for a nearby cave.
